title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, there is an unexpected beeping sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, there should not be any beeping sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the SWT Example ControlExample
2. Go to the Text tab
3. Select Styles SWT.SINGLE
4. Then, select Styles SWT.MULTI
